title: Luxury Wedding Invitation Diorama
prompt: Use the uploaded image as the primary reference. Keep the same composition, camera angle, lighting, color palette, environment, and 3D illustration style. Preserve the scene: a luxury wedding invitation diorama at night near a calm beach resort with water reflections, palm trees, and softly lit huts in the background. In the center foreground, a vertical elegant invitation card with ornamental gold borders and floral decorations. Replace the text on the card with user-entered names and date at the top and center while keeping the same typography style, spacing, and layout. To the right of the card, keep a cute stylized 3D bride and groom couple standing together, smiling, wearing traditional Indian wedding attire. Groom in a pastel sherwani, bride in a peach or blush lehenga with jewelry and bouquet. Maintain their proportions, pose, facial style, and expressions. Lighting is warm, soft, and cinematic with realistic glow reflections on water. Add realistic material textures: matte paper card, embossed gold detailing, soft fabric folds, subtle surface imperfections, gentle shadows. Avoid plastic or AI-smooth surfaces. Add slight film grain, natural depth, realistic light falloff. Maintain night-time ambience with deep blue tones, warm highlights, and natural contrast. Ultra-high resolution, clean composition, professional wedding invitation look, premium handcrafted diorama feel, looks like a real designer-made scene, no AI artifacts, no distortion, no extra elements added.

title: Beach Scrapbook Triple Frame Collage
prompt: Ultra-realistic beach scrapbook photo collage with exactly three vertical Polaroid-style photo frames, arranged in the same positions, angles, and spacing as the reference image. Keep the entire collage layout identical: white instant-photo frames with realistic paper texture and soft shadows, placed diagonally from top to bottom. Background must remain unchanged: golden beach sand on the left, ocean shoreline on the right with realistic sea-foam water waves, natural wet sand transition, true coastal texture. Preserve all decorations in the exact same locations: light blue ribbon bow on the top frame, blue spiral shell, white seashells, blue-white flower, paper clip near the middle frame, starfish on the right side, and shells at the bottom. Lighting should be natural daylight, soft coastal sunlight, realistic shadows, true photographic depth, no artificial glow. Only replace the photos inside the three frames using img-to-img. Do not change the frame size, decoration placement, background, or overall composition. User must upload their own photo for accurate face, skin texture, body proportions, and realism. Hyper-realistic DSLR quality, sharp focus, natural colors, handcrafted scrapbook look, not AI-generated.

title: Save the Date
prompt: INFO (edit only this line): Save the Date | Raja & Rani | 12:34 • Town Hall. TEXT POSITION RULE: This INFO text must appear at the VERY TOP CENTER of the image, above the couple’s heads, clearly readable, aligned neatly in three lines, following natural lighting and perspective, not flat or graphic. PROMPT: Image-to-image generation. STRICT OUTFIT LOCK. The bride and groom MUST wear the EXACT SAME wedding outfits in every generation with ZERO variation. Bride is wearing a fixed traditional wedding lehenga: deep maroon red silk lehenga with heavy antique gold zari embroidery, dense floral and paisley motifs, thick embroidered border at the hem, matching maroon blouse with short sleeves and identical gold embroidery, sheer maroon dupatta with gold border draped over the head and shoulder, same jewelry including traditional gold necklace, matching earrings, bangles, and maang tikka. Fabric texture, embroidery pattern, color tone, folds, drape style, and jewelry placement must remain unchanged. Groom is wearing a fixed traditional wedding sherwani: ivory off-white silk sherwani with subtle gold thread embroidery, straight cut, identical buttons, paired with matching churidar, traditional stole, and mojdi shoes. Fabric texture, embroidery, color, fit, and accessories must remain unchanged. Do NOT redesign, recolor, or alter clothing in any way. The bride and groom are seated together naturally on an elegant luxury sofa. The sofa is fully and organically surrounded with fresh natural flowers including roses, jasmine, peonies, marigolds, and soft green foliage, flowing naturally with no artificial symmetry. Flowers appear real, fresh, and naturally imperfect with visible petal texture and realistic shadows. Background shows a serene natural outdoor environment with lush greenery, trees, soft golden-hour sunlight, cinematic bokeh, and shallow depth of field. Ultra-realistic wedding photography, DSLR quality, 85mm lens look, cinematic composition, premium destination wedding photoshoot aesthetic, 8K resolution, lifelike textures, emotional and timeless.

title: Haldi Ceremony Night View
prompt: Ultra-realistic Indian haldi ceremony at night, bride and groom sitting together on a traditional haldi sofa, groom wearing ivory kurta with yellow stole, bride wearing yellow silk saree with green border, natural turmeric applied on cheeks and hands, candid smiles, realistic skin texture, no artificial smoothness. Night scene with warm fairy lights, hanging lanterns, diya lamps, marigold flower decorations, banana leaves, mango leaf toran, yellow fabric drapes, cinematic festive ambiance. A physical haldi ceremony title board placed behind the couple with clearly readable printed text: 'HALDI CEREMONY'. Below the title, couple names printed naturally: 'Bride Name ♥ Groom Name'. Elegant Indian wedding typography, golden or white lettering, realistic shadows, not floating, not glowing. DSLR wedding photography style, shallow depth of field, soft warm lighting, high dynamic range, true skin tones, ultra-detailed, photorealistic, professional Indian wedding night haldi setup, no AI artifacts.

title: Mehndi Ceremony
prompt: Ultra-realistic high-detail cinematic 3D illustration of an Indian Mehndi ceremony scene, preserving the exact composition, pose, framing, camera angle, facial features, body proportions, and clothing from the reference image. An Indian bride and groom stand facing each other, gently holding the ends of a richly embroidered mustard-yellow dupatta between them. The bride wears a traditional mustard-yellow lehenga with intricate floral embroidery in gold, pink, and red, fine zari work, detailed borders, and realistic fabric folds. She has long natural black hair, soft bridal makeup, warm brown skin tone, expressive eyes, and traditional gold jewelry including earrings, bangles, necklace, and maang tikka. The groom wears an off-white kurta pajama with a mustard-yellow Nehru jacket, realistic fabric texture, neat buttons, styled hair, trimmed beard, and warm skin tone. Behind them is a dense semi-circular floral arch made of red, pink, yellow, and peach roses with green leaves. At the top center of the arch is a clean rectangular signboard with elegant typography reading 'Mehndi'. The background includes rich maroon, blush pink, and beige fabric drapes with vertical patterns, a plush magenta sofa with decorative cushions, and a wooden floor scattered with yellow flower petals. Soft warm indoor lighting, natural shadows, realistic skin texture, accurate embroidery depth, lifelike materials, professional wedding invitation style, premium cinematic quality, photorealistic Pixar-style 3D realism, sharp focus, ultra-detailed, 8K quality.

title: Wings of Power
prompt: Create an ultra-detailed, visually powerful full-body image using the provided photo as the exact reference. Keep the user’s face, body proportions, posture, stance, position, and overall pose exactly the same as in the original image. The user should look confident, strong, and powerful without changing their natural expression or body alignment. The user is standing upright directly in front of a wall. On the wall behind the user, there is a very large, animated-style cartoon mural of wings, extremely big and wide, perfectly aligned so they appear to extend from the user’s back, creating a strong illusion that the wings belong to the user. The wings should be bold, colorful, and dynamic, with exaggerated cartoon feather shapes, smooth outlines, vibrant gradients, and high visual energy, giving a heroic and powerful animated look. The wings must clearly be a painted mural on the wall, not real wings. The user is wearing a shirt that features a printed graphic of the user’s own face, clearly recognizable and matching the same person, designed in a heroic or animated style that visually connects with the wings theme. The face print on the shirt should look naturally printed on fabric with realistic cloth texture, folds, and shadows. The wall should show realistic paint texture and mural detail. Behind the wall, large tall trees and greenery are visible, adding depth and a strong outdoor garden atmosphere. Lighting should be consistent and slightly dramatic, enhancing the powerful mood and aligning shadows and highlights across the user, the shirt print, the wings mural, and the background trees. The final image should look like a real photograph of a powerful person standing in front of a large animated cartoon wing mural, with ultra-high clarity, rich colors, strong visual impact, and a bold heroic presence, without changing the original pose or position of the user.

title: Midnight Reflections
prompt: Create an ultra-detailed, emotionally cinematic image using the provided photo as the exact reference. Keep the user’s face, body proportions, posture, clothing, and overall pose unchanged. The user is sitting quietly on a broken wall, slightly leaned forward, looking down at their shoes, expressing a deep, thoughtful, emotional feeling. The scene takes place at night during light rain. Raindrops are visible falling through the air and collecting on surfaces, creating soft reflections on the ground. Around the scene, street poles and electric poles are visible, some with wires stretching across, adding realism and urban depth. Tall trees surround the area, their leaves gently catching moonlight and rain, forming a natural yet moody environment. In the background, a few cars are visible on the road, either parked or slowly passing, with soft headlights and taillights glowing through the rain, slightly blurred to create depth and atmosphere. A single light bulb near the user glows warmly, casting soft light on the user and the broken wall, contrasting with the cool blue and purple night tones. The user is wearing headphones naturally, clearly visible, suggesting they are deeply connected to music. On the right side of the image, a clean and modern music player interface is visible, showing a song name along with play and pause buttons, designed to feel integrated into the scene without overpowering it. The connection between the user and the music player should feel emotional and symbolic, as if the music is guiding their thoughts. Above, the sky shows a glowing moon and scattered stars blended with rich night colors. The broken wall should show realistic cracks, texture, and age. The overall image should feel calm, emotional, and immersive, like a quiet moment of self-reflection in a rainy night environment. Enhance realism, clarity, lighting balance, color richness, and depth while keeping the user exactly the same and making the final image feel powerful, moody, and deeply connected to emotion and music.

title: Red Roses, Red Dreams
prompt: Use the provided image as the exact visual reference and recreate the same photograph with maximum accuracy. Preserve the girl’s face, facial expression, hairstyle, hair accessories, skin tone, body proportions, and posture exactly as shown. Replace the original outfit with a stylish, elegant red dress that looks fashionable and graceful, keeping a similar fit and silhouette so it suits the scene naturally. The red dress should have realistic fabric texture, soft folds, and natural shadows, enhancing a romantic night-time feel without changing the pose or body alignment. The girl is holding a large bouquet of deep red roses with green stems tied together using a red ribbon. The bouquet size, flower arrangement, color, and position must remain exactly the same. The left hand is gently placed on top of the flowers, lightly touching and adjusting the roses, while the right hand supports the bouquet from below, matching the exact hand placement and gesture. The girl is looking down toward the bouquet of flowers with a soft, calm, and romantic expression. Maintain the same camera angle and framing with shallow depth of field. Keep the background as a nighttime urban city scene with blurred bokeh lights, illuminated buildings, and soft glowing street lights, preserving the same background layout and mood. Maintain cinematic night lighting that softly illuminates the girl, the red dress, and the flowers while keeping the background lights diffused and out of focus. Do not change the pose, gaze direction, hand placement, bouquet position, camera angle, or background composition. Only enhance image clarity, sharpness, realistic skin texture, fabric detail of the red dress, rose petal texture, lighting balance, and overall realism so the result looks like a high-quality enhanced version of the same photograph, not a different image.

title: A Rose for You
prompt: Create an ultra-detailed, realistic night-time jungle scene using the provided image as the exact reference for the girl. There is a small camping tent visible in the background among the trees, softly lit, and a campfire burning nearby with gentle orange flames and glowing embers, casting warm light on the surroundings. The jungle is dense with tall trees, natural ground, and a deep night sky filled with bright stars and soft moonlight, creating a peaceful and romantic atmosphere. Only the girl is clearly visible in the scene. She is wearing a very pretty, stylish pink dress that looks elegant and graceful, with realistic fabric texture, soft folds, and natural shadows. The girl is facing directly toward the camera, holding a single red rose flower in her right hand and extending it slightly forward toward the viewer, creating the feeling that she is offering the rose to the person watching the image. Her expression is soft, warm, and emotional, making it feel like a real person gently giving a rose to someone special. There is no visible boy or man in the scene. Instead, the presence of the favorite person is suggested subtly through soft light or focus in front of the girl, without showing them physically. The lighting combines cool moonlight from above with warm firelight from the campfire, creating beautiful contrast and depth. The tent, fire, trees, stars, and lighting should all feel natural and realistic. The final image should feel intimate, emotional, and immersive, like a real moment captured in a quiet jungle at night where the viewer feels personally connected as the one receiving the rose.

title: A Rose for You

The night sky is filled with bright stars and soft moonlight, creating a dreamy and emotional atmosphere. The single flower print should be clear and artistic, symbolizing love and sincerity. The boy is facing directly toward the camera, holding a single red rose flower in his right hand and extending it slightly forward toward the viewer, creating the feeling that he is offering the rose to someone special. His expression is calm, sincere, and emotional, making the viewer feel personally connected as the one receiving the flower. No other person is visible; instead, the presence of the favorite person is suggested subtly through soft light and focus in front of him. The final image should feel intimate, romantic, and cinematic, like a real heartfelt moment captured in a quiet jungle at night, with enhanced realism, depth, warm color tones, and strong emotional impact.
